followers.descFollower: After all this time creating content that only you and maybe your mother saw, someone finally got interested and followed you!

fans.descFan: Some of your followers have started to delve deeper into the obscure parts of your content and even into parts of your real life. These people are calling themselves your fans.

paparazzi.descPaparazzo: One day, you heard the sound of a camera shutter as you were walking down the street. When you turned around to see what it was, you realized that someone mediocrely hidden had taken a picture of you, perhaps hoping to capture the beauty of your spontaneity. After witnessing the same situation repeat itself several times every day, you locked yourself in your house and avoided going out again.

stalkers.descStalker: Even worse than the paparazzi are those weird people you happen to reply to via private message one day. The stalkers have fallen so in love with you that they have found out all your personal information and stop by your house every day to try to get a chance to talk to you.

lunatics.descLunatic: They are certainly not as unbearable as the paparazzi, nor as dangerous as the stalkers, but they are no less determined, dedicating all 24 hours of the day to you and your creations.

bots.descBot: The time has come when you have realized the limits of humanity's capabilities. To surpass human consciousness and all its flaws, you need to have an army of perfect machines at your side, which work exclusively to give you likes at a frighteningly fast rate and in comically huge quantities.

lpc.descLpc: Increase your own spam capacity by unlocking the incredible technique of giving multiple likes to your own content with just one click.

doubleFollowers.descDoubleFollowers: Encourage different forms of engagement among followers to make the algorithm show your content in the recommendations of all users.

doubleFans.descDoubleFans: Study your analytics and make informed decisions about what types of content are worth continuing to produce, increasing overall quality. As a result, your existing fans will be even more likely to like your content.

doublePaparazzi.descDoublePaparazzi: After a long time without touching grass, go out to a public place so that the paparazzi can take new photos of you (still without your consent, of course).

doubleLunatics.descDoubleLunatics: Acknowledge the existence of the lunatic fans, especially by mentioning them personally, so that they get excited and give even more likes.

doubleBots.descDoubleBots: Pay a little more to upgrade your bot service plan and receive even more accounts inflating your statistics with exciting numbers (unfortunately, this also means that you are not really famous).

reset.resetDialogString: Do you really want to erase all game data?

credits.creditsDialogString:
Like Clicker
